description: Number of divisors of n^n, or of A000312.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
prog: (PARI) je=[]; for(n=0,200,je=concat(je,numdiv(n^n))); je(PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b062319.txt", n, " ", numdiv(n^n)); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 04 2009(PARI) a(n)=local(fm);fm=factor(n);prod(k=1,matsize(fm)[1],fm[k,2]*n+1) \\ _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, May 03 2011(MAGMA) [NumberOfDivisors(n^n): n in  [0..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2014
crossrefs: Cf. A000005, A046798, A077592, A035116. [From _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Nov 09 2010]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 05 2001
